posts.title: title 1
posts.content:
Contact Us

We are Smart Codee here,
To help success on your next IT Project!

Montreal Software and Web Development of SaaS and Customize solution

Smart Codee is Software and Web Development company base in Montreal, we specialize in software application and tailored developments which not only provide SaaS solution but also provide customize solution to bring your business and software to next level.

  • Free evaluation existing software to reduce costs and efforts That's right, unfortunately, most of software development companies claim they provide standard solution for you, however; they always start from scratch that made most of your existing software throw to trash. Proudly, we will do free evaluation of your existing software (doesn't matter which language it is, as long as it's still usable) and provide the most reasonable solution to make use of your existing software that compatible with our SaaS solution
  • Agile development to get feedback fast and adjust to right direction normally, you would find the companies you worked spending long time to finish the product but it's far away from what you want. Why this happened? it's because when development company working on your product they don't give enough time for you to give feedback on each stage instead they assume this is what you need. In contrast, we follow agile development methodology that will plan with you and give you demo every 2 weeks to make sure we are in the same page to avoid time wasting

  • Turn your idea to business Most of time, you will find yourself having a lot of brilliant ideas but having so many steps to turn it to business. Our SaaS solution is including a lot of existing (CMS, CRM, Shopping-cart, PLM, etc) features that will help you to build your foundation fast and achieve to actual idea faster. We also would love to work on the idea and turn it to our SaaS platform.
  • Big range of service and region As a web development company, we also offer a big range of other services listed below, not only Canada but also all over the world.
see more

Software & Web Development

We are a software & web development company located in Montreal specialized in tailored developments

desktop_mac

WEB DEVELOPMENT

Develop web based software using latest technology (Java, Kotlin, Golang, React, Angular, HTML5/CSS3) to make web application responsible by mobile iPad and PC

business

BUSINESS ORIENTED

Build application base on custom business needs (CRM, CMS, E-COMMERCE) to make your business to next level of success

cloud

SaaS SOLUTION

Provide software as cloud based solution to provide access to the software most commonly via a website or mobile apps with multi-tenant solution

dns

APP HOSTING

Help you to move your web application to the infrastructure extends across multiple global datacenters, and is designed to be secure, reliable and efficient

font_download

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

Learning customer data to build AI solution on top of business to automates and better predicts the result of what needed (OpenCV, Neural System)

timeline

PROJECT MANAGEMENT

Manage projects using agile development methodology to gain feedback from customer quickly and improve software release cycle on time
